sentences.en: Her breathing became lighter as the girl saw the success of her remonstrance.
sentences.cn: 那姑娘看到自己的劝说已经成功,心也宽了些.

sentences.en: I eschewed upbraiding, I curtailed remonstrance.
If we can accept others'remonstrance, we are both virtuous and tolerant.
sentences.cn: 能接受规劝,更是有德有量.

sentences.en: M. Morrel felt that further resistance or remonstrance was useless.
sentences.cn: 莫雷尔先生觉得此事辩也是没用的.
敏妮想起了汉生的告诫.

sentences.en: Mr. Abel needed no more remonstrance or persuasion.
sentences.cn: 阿伯尔少爷再不需要什么劝告或说服了.

sentences.en: She had abandoned all attempts at remonstrance with Thomas.
sentences.cn: 她已经放弃了一切劝戒托马斯的尝试.

words.tran_cn: 责备，告诫；抗议；表示异议
